description: Complete system overview documenting the construction estimate comparison system architecture, key components, and their interactions
Detailed documentation of the custom construction estimate comparison algorithm, including matching rules, thresholds, and prioritization logic
Comprehensive documentation of data structures used for estimate comparison, including industry-specific codes, measurements, and pricing models
Documentation of the PDF parsing logic, terminology normalization, and construction-specific item matching process
Detailed documentation of the subdomain-based routing system, including access control rules and tool isolation implementation
